topic.title: Subject Data Human Clinical Trials - conformance rules

section.p: This fundamental template contains the core document related information for reporting the experience of a human subject within a clinical trial.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCCLIN" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 Confidentiality)
Documents the confidentiality level of the document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
The effective date for the contents of the document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
The identifier assigned to the subject data report. It is needed to uniquely identify a particular report of subject data from a study.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode
The language used for the document. The entry may be left out, if the language used is English.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] realmCode
Identifies a country or other administrative unit that has defined particular rules for the format or content of the clinical document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] setId
An identifier that remains consistent across all revisions derived from a common original. In the first version of the document - VersonNumber = 1, setId and id will be identical.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] versionNumber
A unique identifier for a version of a report.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Human Clinical Subject Data Document Body (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.13)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] author
This author SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="AUT"
This author SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED"
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
An identifier for the investigator responsible for the document. [SDTM: INVID]
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN"
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This assignedPerson SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] name
The name of the investigator. [SDTM: INVNAM].
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedOrganization
This representedOrganization SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="ORG"
This representedOrganization SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
Contains the identifier of the study site for the investigator. [SDTM: SITEID].
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr
The only part of the address that is required is the country. This records the country of the investigational site associated with the subject's participation in the study. [SDTM: COUNTRY].
This representedOrganization SHALL satisfy: Country shall be valued where addressPartType="country".

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] documentationOf
This documentationOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DOC"
This documentationOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
The code value indicates the related act refers to the study.
This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
The identifier of the study. [SDTM: STUDYID]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] recordTarget
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RCT"
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole
This patientRole SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PAT"
This patientRole SHALL contain [2..2] id
A set of identifiers for the study subject. These include the unique study ID (SDTM: USUBJID) which identifies the subject across all studies for a product, and a study specific ID (SDTM:SUBJID) which identifies the subject within the context of a single study.
This patientRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN"
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus)
[SDTM: SEX]
This patient SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime
The date of the study subject's birth. [SDTM: BRTHDTC]
This patient SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] ethnicGroupCode
[SDTM: ETHNIC
This patient SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] raceCode
[SDTM: RACE]
This patientRole SHALL satisfy: The unique subject ID shall be present. [SDTM, USUBJID].
This patientRole SHALL satisfy: Shall include an identifer for the subject within the study. [SDTM, SUBJID].
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCCLIN" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] realmCode
Identifies a country or other administrative unit that has defined particular rules for the format or content of the clinical document.
Contains exactly one [1..1] typeId with data type Infrastructure Root Type Id

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
The identifier assigned to the subject data report. It is needed to uniquely identify a particular report of subject data from a study.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
The effective date for the contents of the document.

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 Confidentiality)
Documents the confidentiality level of the document.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode
The language used for the document. The entry may be left out, if the language used is English.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] setId
An identifier that remains consistent across all revisions derived from a common original. In the first version of the document - VersonNumber = 1, setId and id will be identical.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] versionNumber
A unique identifier for a version of a report.
Contains exactly one [1..1] custodian, where its type is Custodian
Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Human Clinical Subject Data Document Body (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.13)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] author
This author SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="AUT"
This author SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED"
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
An identifier for the investigator responsible for the document. [SDTM: INVID]
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN"
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This assignedPerson SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] name
The name of the investigator. [SDTM: INVNAM].
This assignedAuthor SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedOrganization
This representedOrganization SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="ORG"
This representedOrganization SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
Contains the identifier of the study site for the investigator. [SDTM: SITEID].
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr
The only part of the address that is required is the country. This records the country of the investigational site associated with the subject's participation in the study. [SDTM: COUNTRY].
This representedOrganization SHALL satisfy: Country shall be valued where addressPartType="country".

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] documentationOf
This documentationOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DOC"
This documentationOf SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
The code value indicates the related act refers to the study.
This serviceEvent SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
The identifier of the study. [SDTM: STUDYID]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] recordTarget
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RCT"
This recordTarget SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole
This patientRole SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PAT"
This patientRole SHALL contain [2..2] id
A set of identifiers for the study subject. These include the unique study ID (SDTM: USUBJID) which identifies the subject across all studies for a product, and a study specific ID (SDTM:SUBJID) which identifies the subject within the context of a single study.
This patientRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN"
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus)
[SDTM: SEX]
This patient SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime
The date of the study subject's birth. [SDTM: BRTHDTC]
This patient SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] ethnicGroupCode
[SDTM: ETHNIC
This patient SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] raceCode
[SDTM: RACE]
This patientRole SHALL satisfy: The unique subject ID shall be present. [SDTM, USUBJID].
This patientRole SHALL satisfy: Shall include an identifer for the subject within the study. [SDTM, SUBJID].

row.entry: human Clinical Subject Data Document Body
human Clinical Subject Data Document Body
Human Clinical Subject Data Document Body

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd" classCode="DOCCLIN" moodCode="EVN"> <realmCode code="Code forrealmCode"/> <typeId root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.1"/> <id root="801689827" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="TBD" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <effectiveTime/> <confidentialityCode code="1686503345"/> <languageCode code="Code forlanguageCode"/> <setId root="5e446624-967e-4343-9a4e-f7676d7b95db" extension="MDHT"/> <versionNumber value="1"/> <recordTarget typeCode="RCT"> <patientRole classCode="PAT"> <id root="470272981" extension="MDHT"/> <patient classCode="PSN" determinerCode="INSTANCE"> <administrativeGenderCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> </patient>
